notifications.name: System Notification - Maintenance
notifications.message: This app will be migrated to newer servers and therefore will be unavailable between 02:30 PM IST (05:00 AM ET) - 04:00 PM IST (06:30 AM ET) on May 30th, 2017

notifications.name: System Notification - Server Migration
notifications.message: We are migrating the application and database to new servers. You can continue using this application. We will let you know once the migration is complete.
